Unnamed: 0: unsalted butter, soft, or Crisco shortening
As it appears above, recipe yields how many servings?
In a mixer bowl, with the paddle attachment, cream the butter or shortening with the sugar.  Add the eggs and mix until incor-
porated.  Add vanilla, cream of tartar and baking soda and mix well.  Add flour and mix just until incorporated.  (Over mixing
flour will toughen cookies!)  Scoop dough with #40 scoop and roll in cinnamon-sugar and place on parchment lined sheet pans.
Bake at 325° for about 10 minutes, rotating after 7 or 8 minutes, or just until lightly browned.
